question:
you have seen an advertisement in an australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child.


Write a letter to the parents. In your letter


1. Explain why you would like the job
2. give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ
3. say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I am writing this letter to apply for the caretaker job to look after your child as mentioned in the newspaper advertisement. This is an amazing opportunity for me to spend my break time in australia while I wait for the completion of my residency visa process.

I have completed my schooling in India and planning to move to australia for my further education and thinking of getting the country's residency. I am living with a big family here in my home country and when I travel to australia. I am going to miss my family a lot especially my younger brothers. Fortunately, if I get this job, then I can spend a good amount of time with a family and most importantly I can be with your kid whom I will consider as my brother.

As I mentioned above, I am used to be with a lot of childrens most of the time, and being an elder child in our family I had to look after my younger brothers since they were born as my parents were working. So, I believe I can take good care of your baby and please note that I am very good at reciting rhymes and singing lullaby for your little one.

During my free time, I am planning to prepare for university entrance exams and I have a bucket list of tourist places that I always wished to visit in australia - mainly the beaches. I will spend some time visiting these attractions.
Along with this letter, I have attached a personal photograph of myself, my visa application process and a reference letter from my cousin who lives in australia.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
